initialize {cfgcsv} Protopackage Documentation

Initialize cfgcsv protopackage instance

Description

The anonymous function defined in the R subdirectory coordinates initialization of an instance of the protopackage.

Usage 

source ( "PATH/R/initialize.R" ) [[ 1 ]] ( path , R , args )

Arguments

path

path to the cfgcsv installation directory

R

the name of the R (without the ".R" extension) of the R file under the installation subdirectory inst/extdata/R/cfgcsvEnv

args

arguments to be passed to the function whose source is specified by the R argument.

See Also

Examples

Examples 

# (See the file 1.R under the installation
# subdirectory inst/extdata/Examples/R)
[Protopackage cfgcsv version X.X.X]
